item.title: PTON
item.description: score:18 Chances: Peloton will release its fourth quarter and full-year fiscal 2023 results. Peloton stock rose 26.3% last month, driven by bullish sentiment and favorable macroeconomic data. Retail investors’ renewed interest in meme stocks is bringing attention to Peloton. Risks: Peloton remains far from being profitable and has severe fundamental weaknesses.
